topic.title: 반려동물 정기 검진 받기
topic.description: 반려동물과 함께 동물병원에 방문하여 정기 검진을 받는 상황에 대한 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 안녕하세요, 저희 강아지 코코 정기 검진 예약을 하고 왔어요.
아니요, 특별한 건 없었는데 평소보다 물을 좀 많이 마시는 것 같아요.
검사 결과는 아주 좋습니다. 아주 건강하네요.
다행이네요! 다음 검진은 언제쯤 오면 될까요?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'm here for my dog Coco's regular check-up appointment.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'm here for my dog Coco's | regular check-up appointment.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, hello! Coco, would you like to come over here?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, hello! || Coco, | would you like to come over here?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Have there been any specific symptoms recently?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Have there been | any specific symptoms | recently?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: No, nothing in particular, but he seems to be drinking more water than usual.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: No, | nothing in particular, || but he seems to be drinking | more water than usual.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I see. I'll start with a basic physical examination.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I see. || I'll start with | a basic physical examination.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: The exam results are very good. He's very healthy.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: The exam results | are very good. || He's very healthy.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: That's a relief! When should I come for the next check-up?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: That's a relief! || When should I come | for the next check-up?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: You can visit again in a year.
